item.title: UMpande kaSenzangakhona
item.scopeAndContent: [Source - Benathi Marufu for FHYA, 2020: A digital copy of the book uMpande kaSenzangakhona ukuxoxa ku R. R. R. Dhlomo. Umlobi walezi: Izikhali Zanamuhla, Ushaka, Dingane kaSenzangakhona, Ukwazi Kuyathuthukisa. Abakhiphi bamabuku Shutter & Shooter booksellers and stationers Pietermaritzburg. Copyright 1938.]
